title: Death in Pink
description: "A snow-clad birthday party ends with a mysterious call to 911. Ivana Ružić is dead. Too many suspects, unreliable witnesses, jealous lovers, and secret family members will make this case a nightmare for the Belgrade police department.Take a closer look at the corrupt society of the Serbian capital. The other side of the rusty coin is a detective who has to withstand lies, a thirst for power, and meddling politics in order to solve the murder.But Nikola Liman is just one man, and lies have many faces…""As icy and forbidding as the frozen streets on which it plays out, Djordje Bajic’s DEATH IN PINK is a very well written slice of Balkan Noir. A classy contemporary thriller which provides a perfect change of landscape for those needing a break from American set mysteries." ~Kent Lane for IndieReader
author: Đorđe Bajić
